info.name: Stocky
info.description:
Stocky is a system where users receive free shares of Indian stocks as part of onboarding and referral rewards.  
Every time a reward is given:

- A reward record is created
    
- The user’s holdings are updated
    
- The company’s ledger is updated (shares received, cash spent, brokerage fees)
    
- Stock prices are fetched to show INR value to the user

request.description:
This route gives a user a reward of X shares for a specific stock

It performs multiple actions:

(1)Stores the reward event

(2)Updates the user's holdings table

(3)Creates 3 ledger entries (company gets shares, cash outflow, brokerage fees)
Returns all rewards that the user received today.

This route returns

1. Total shares rewarded today (grouped by stock)
    
2. Current INR value of all holdings
Returns the INR value of rewards for previous days (excluding today).
